meanings.definition: A road or pavement made of asphalt.
meanings.sent1: The children played hopscotch on the blacktop.
meanings.sent2: The workers repaired the blacktop on the street.
meanings.sent3: The blacktop seemed to melt under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent4: The blacktop stretched out like a dark ribbon through the city.
meanings.sent5: The rain glistened on the blacktop, reflecting the streetlights.
